sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: But outwardly at least, people in Niamey, Niger's capital, appear to support the coup which happened on July 26th. The United Nations has said it's concerned about the welfare of President Mohamed Bazoum, who's been under house arrest since he was deposed. The coup's leaders have warned they'll execute him if they're attacked.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14
sentences.sentence: Former South African President Jacob Zuma returned to jail on Friday, only to be released two hours later and will not be required to complete his prison sentence. He was incarcerated in 2021 for defying a court order to appear at a corruption inquiry, but controversially was released two months into his 15-month sentence for health reasons. Last month, the court declared his medical parole invalid. But Zuma was among some 10,000 prisoners who were granted remission on Friday, purportedly to reduce overcrowding in jails.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14
sentences.sentence: The governor of the U.S. state of Hawaii has warned the death toll from catastrophic wildfires which swept through the island of Maui is expected to rise significantly.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: More than 50 people are already confirmed dead.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: President Joe Biden has declared a major disaster and vowed to send all available resources to help people flee. We're working as quickly as possible to fight these fires and evacuate residents and tourists. In the meantime, our prayers with the people of Hawaii, but not just our prayers. Every asset we have will be available to them. And we've seen they've seen their homes, their businesses destroyed and some have lost loved ones and it's not over yet.

sentences.sentence: Fueled by a dry summer and strong winds from a passing hurricane, the fire started on Tuesday and took the Pacific holiday island by surprise.

sentences.sentence: Thousands have been displaced, hundreds of buildings destroyed and entire neighbourhoods devastated.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The extent of that devastation is yet to be fully revealed, while search and rescue operations continue into parts of the island that had been inaccessible due to ongoing fires.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14
sentences.sentence: It could be the oldest lakeside village in Europe and it's been found beneath the blue waters of Albania's Lake Orid, known as the Pearl of the Balkans.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14
sentences.sentence: Archaeologists diving into the lake have discovered the remains of a settlement built on stilts, a community that dates back 8,000 years. Radiocarbon tests date it to between 6000 and 5800 BC.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: One hypothesis is that the people who built the settlement wanted to protect themselves.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14
sentences.sentence: During one of the many dives, archaeologists found evidence suggesting thousands of wooden spikes were used as defensive barricades.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14
sentences.sentence: It could take archaeologists decades of study to find out just what filled those Neolithic home builders with such fear and dread.

sentences.sentence: The fisherman's quick hands and sunburned face conceal the strong and noble soul of an environmental activist and an art lover.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14
sentences.sentence: Paolo the fisherman, as altri in Tuscany, ha combattuto il pescato traulare per quasi 40 anni.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14
sentences.sentence: Questo tipo di pescato è illegale a 3 milioni di metri di costa e in riserve marine protette.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14
sentences.sentence: Paolo ha combattuto gli interessi dell'industria grande e le infiltrazioni di crimini organizzati.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Da tanti anni che non è cambiato niente, interessi di grande industria e le infiltrazioni di crimini organizzati.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14
sentences.sentence: Tra la pesca nelle vittime costali distrugg destroys the persidonia, a marine plant providing the sea with oxygen, and it devastates the entire marine ecosystem with the disappearance of fish and the whole sea life cycle.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14
sentences.sentence: Through his association, the House of Fish, Paolo the fisherman managed to involve entrepreneurs and artists in the creation of a submerged museum where the beauty of the statues laid La lotta di Paolo il pescatore prosegue in interrotta, con la stessa determinazione di 40 anni fa.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Ha provato solitudine e sconforto, ma anche il sostegno di tante persone e delle associazioni ambientaliste internazionali. Adesso il suo progetto va avanti, non intende fermarsi perché il mare è un bene di tutti ed è fondamentale per la nostra sopravvivenza.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Il mare è la mia vita e questo mi ha dato una grande emozione nel momento in cui dentro di me è scattato quella luce dell'arte nel mare.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Perché forse se avessi detto, continuo a mettere a mare blocchi di cemento, adesso nemmeno voi sareste qui.

Tomorrow, hosts Australia will face France for a spot in the semis, while World Cup reigning champions England will have to do without their young star Lauren James as they get ready to face a noisy and colourful Colombia.
